welcome.subtitle: When you train with us, you're not just a member, you're family.

history.title: How It All Began
history.content1: Ali's Boxing Gym began in 2017, founded by Ali in Rawai, Phuket. What started as a small gym with a big heart quickly became known for its no-nonsense training, strong community values, and the welcoming energy Ali built into everything he did.
history.content2: The vision was clear from day one: create a space where everyone, from complete beginners to pro fighters, could train with discipline, grow with confidence, and feel like family.

growth.title: Growing the Vision
growth.content1: After several strong years in Rawai, the gym moved to a bigger and better location in Chalong, right in the heart of Phuket's fitness street. The move wasn't just about space. It was about continuing to grow the vision and giving fighters and fitness lovers the environment they needed to push themselves further.
growth.content2: Ali had already built a trusted name through Ali's BBQ, known for its fresh food and loyal customer base, but boxing was his true passion. A place to pass on what boxing taught him: respect, focus, and resilience.

today.title: Ali's Boxing Gym Today
today.content: Today, Ali's Boxing Gym stands as a proud, family-run space built on real values. No hype. No shortcuts. Just honest training and a team that's got your back.
